content: @nikomatsakis you mentioned briefly about syncing up next week, in passing :slight_smile: . Would you be available sometime between 8 - 11 AM your time on Monday next week. I guess you wanted to sync up for next steps or whatever you had in mind. Unfortunately Mon is the only day I am available.
I'm actually not sure if we need to sync or not, maybe we can try to keep things going just "async" over Zulip...
that time on Monday doesn't really work for me
@nikomatsakis Sure, async on zulip works just fine :smiley:
